title: I can't move my character!!
body:
Yesterday league was working fine but whem I went to play it today, my character would move, my laptop would respond to all the other commands but when I click on the page to move, it won't, so now I keep having to reconnect etc.

Any suggestions to how I can fix this??? 

Pleasseeeeeeee.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having problems keeping a connection, which will result in input delays and ultimately a disconnection.  I'm guessing you might also be having some packet loss problems, and I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going wrong.  The results will also provide resolution steps depending on what it finds.  Let me know if you have any questions!
